Header: Central Troops Douse Wild Fire at Sapugoda Kanda, Moneragala
Content: 121 Brigade troops of the Security Force Headquarters Central (SFHQ-C) a few days ago rose to the occasion and doused a bush fire that erupted in the general area of Sapugoda Kanda, Anapallama in the Moneragala district on the instructions of Major General Rukmal Dias, Commander, Security Forces, Central under the supervision of the Commanding officer, 9t Sri Lanka Sinha Regiment troops. One Officer and twentyfive members of the troops took part in the efforts.
